And Sarah Palin , another the Fox luminary, would have the most to lose financially from running. Rick Santorum thinks the left is trying to goad her into it, hoping she would be weak among the independent voters who decide most elections. The managerial constipation threatened to put Google at a competitive disadvantage as younger, more nimble Internet services such as Facebook pounce on new trends to lure away users and advertisers. My goal is to run Google at the pace and with the soul and passion of a start-up. I think I will have time to do that given the way we have split up our responsibilities, Mr Page said. Mr Eric Schmidt concurred, saying it had started to become clear the company needed to be run more crisply. talkback No responses currently. an asset likely to carry over even if the Mubarak government falls, Parker says. "He is not the kind of man to have nurtured candidates for his own eventual replacement," Parker told me yesterday. So even the act of taking a job promotion from a dying regime, in the middle of the crisis, may not have hurt his chances to continue running Egypt's antiquities.( The resignations and shuffling of Mubarak's cabinet this past weekend resulted, for Zahi Hawass , in his promotion.)
